name: cash-dom
description: An absurdly small jQuery alternative for modern browsers.

scripts.build:deploy: npm run build:esm && npm run build:prod
scripts.dev: npm run build:dev && npm run watch:dev
scripts.prod: npm run build:prod && npm run watch:prod
scripts.test:jquery: ( git -C ./test/jquery pull || git clone https://github.com/jquery/jquery.git ./test/jquery ) && npm run test:jquery:build && cd ./test/jquery && opn http://localhost:4444/test/index.html\?module=css && php -S localhost:4444
scripts.test:jquery:build:watch: while sleep 1; do npm run test:jquery:build; done

author: Ken Wheeler <ken_wheeler@me.com>
